alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 29 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Ravalli County through 245 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamilton, moving north at 5 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Woodside, Grantsdale and Corvallis. This includes Highway 93 S between mile markers 40 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys
